title: Daily Log-In bonus
body: I believe that a daily login bonus reward should be added so people can have something to look forward to when logging in instead of getting nothing for playing daily. Maybe an Ip boost for a few games, maybe a free random rune your dont own, or even something simple as 500-1000 Ip. this would allow people who play casually to get more to play with. just my thoughts on helping the casual players since the game is balanced around pro players mostly.
